name: Earth Quiz
description:
If you like this game support its further crazy, multiplayer development:

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/flat-earthers-vs-round-earthers-ultimate-batt...

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Do you know where on Earth is Krakow and why does it matter for our future? You can find it out in this 3D map quiz game. You will check your knowledge, expand it, see the beauty and dangers of our planet and compete with friends.

Note: It is not another flat-Earth quiz, so be prepared for the next dimensions!

You can play in 3 game modes:
- Find a place – search cities within 1000 km range,
- Quiz – just pick a place from a list,
- Select a country.

There are thematic games about hurricanes, earthquakes, air pollution, floods, coral reefs, million cities, capitals, airports, busiest ports and more. Every city has its colour and story to tell.

The game is a beautiful 3D visualization of our globe. You discover locations looking at our planet from space. You can see another dimension of mountains with a 3D futuristic view, see the charming lights of cities at night and all colours of Earth in daylight.

Dive in and explore!
